comments.body: Added this test in a separate class because the other tests are parameterized, but this one doesn't need to be.
Pretty straightforward test; just make sure we can process some data end-to-end while relying on the default (de)serializer.

Thanks for the test @vvcephei.  Just for a sanity check, what do think about adding some additional tests where we do some permutations with default vs. provided serdes.  For example Table 1 provides serdes via consumed but writes using defaults etc.
Thanks for the review! Sure, that seems like a good idea.
